name: arbiter-frame
description: This is a Node/Browserify/Babel/Backbone/React/etc boilerplate. To be used as an initial scaffolding tool.
author: Matthew Keas <matthiasak@gmail.com>

scripts.js-once: browserify -e build/app.js -v -d  | exorcist dist/app.js.map > dist/app.js; browserify -e build/serviceworker.js -v -d  | exorcist dist/serviceworker.js.map > dist/serviceworker.js; browserify -e build/polyfill.js -v -d  | exorcist dist/polyfill.js.map > dist/polyfill.js;
scripts.bower: bower install --allow-root; cp ./node_modules/codemirror/lib/codemirror.css ./node_modules/codemirror/lib/codemirror.scss; cp ./node_modules/codemirror/addon/fold/foldgutter.css ./node_modules/codemirror/addon/fold/foldgutter.scss; cp ./node_modules/codemirror/theme/material.css ./node_modules/codemirror/theme/material.scss; echo 'bower dependencies installed';
scripts.postinstall: npm-run-all prod bower transpile-once js-once css
scripts.publish:gh-pages: git add . && git commit -am 'cleaning up any staged and uncomitted changes'; git checkout master; npm-run-all postinstall && git subtree split --prefix dist -b autobuilder && git checkout autobuilder && cp dist/app.js . && cp dist/style.css . && git add app.js style.css && git commit -am 'cleaning and pushing' && git push origin autobuilder:gh-pages --force; git checkout master; git branch -Dq autobuilder; echo 'done';
scripts.publish:surge: npm-run-all build:*; rm -rf dist/esdoc; surge dist; echo 'done';
scripts.teardown:
surge list; echo 'type a domain from above: 
 ------------ 

 '; surge teardown
scripts.clean:subtrees: git reflog expire --all --expire-unreachable=0; git repack -A -d; git prune; git gc;
scripts.squash: git reset $npm_package_config_squash_reset; git add .; git commit -am $npm_package_config_squash_msg; git push origin HEAD --force;
scripts.deploy: git add .; git commit -am 'making updates'; npm version patch; git push origin master;
